fullText: This show is a kaleidoscopic whirl of movement, sound and light that keeps you dazzled even when it doesn't make complete sense. It's theater as a contact sport, and it leaves you breathless.

bwwExcerpt: "Yet even with a well-drilled cast that includes  bright Broadway  headliners like Norbert Leo Butz and Marin Mazzie, the  realization sets  in early that this British-born exploration of  smoke-and-mirror  financial practices isnâ€™t much more than smoke and  mirrors itself."
